content: Since last week i have trouble reaching the hapi website. I use the http://jamesagnew.github.io/hapi-fhir/ bookmark. This address forwards me to http://hapifhir.io, however it can not be found? Chrome tells me "hapifhir.ioâ€™s server DNS address could not be found." Maybe an error in a DNS record?
i have the same problem with hapifhir.io. Sometimes it works - sometimes Chrome can't resolve the DNS address. Seems very strange to me, do you have problems with your DNS Servers @James Agnew ?
It's not a browser problem. It's a DNS problem.
it helps to clear the caches from the browser. It works for me now.

Sorry everyone about the DNS issues :( I know a lot of people are having trouble getting through right now.

I opened a ticket with our DNS provider this morning, and they said that they had a bad record in their system screwing things up (whatever that means). They have fixed it, so things should propate and get back to normal over the next 24 hours.
